name: 機器人視覺
goals: Visual servoing for robot manipulation. Control of complex motion plans using computer vision algorithms.
High-accuracy mobile vision for mobile robots.
Robot control, navigation, and task performance using computer vision. Examples are from international competitions such as FIRA HuroCup and IROS Robot Magic.
syllabus:
Week 1: Pixels, images, cameras

Week 2: Linear algebra and Probability/Statistics Review.

Week 3: Blob Detection and Color Predicates

Week 4: Camera calibration. Lectures and Practical Exercise

Week 5: Convolution

Week 6: Sobel and Canny Edge Detection.  
Week 7: Template Matching and Harris Corner Detector.  
Week 8: SIFT Features, HOG.  
Week 9: SURF Features and Face Detection. Midterm  
Week 10: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)  
Week 11: Object Recognition using SVMs and CNNs  
Week 12: Lukas-Kanade and Farneback Optical Flow  
Week 13: Lukas-Kanade and Farneback Optical Flow. Lectures and Exercise (Egomotion Estimation for FIRA.

Sprint Robot Competition)  
Week 14: Stereo vision  
Week 15: Stereo vision

Week 16: Structure from Motion (SFM)

Week 17: Ego-motion Estimation and Visual SLAM

Week 18: Pose estimation. Final Exam

methodologies.note: 包含2 個作業，每個各佔總成績的10%，及一個佔40%的專題作業

grading.note: 包含2 個作業，每個各佔總成績的10%，及一個佔40%的專題。在專題中，學生們需運用電腦視覺的演算法來解決FIRA HuroCup 或IROS Robot Magic 競賽中會碰到的某些問題；此二比賽是目前人形機器人相關比賽中最具挑戰性的賽事。
